Classes/RingByteBuffer.html#/s:7Rubicon1.abstract: The number of bytes in the available.

Classes/RingByteBuffer.html#/s:7Rubicon1.name: hasBytesAvailable
Classes/RingByteBuffer.html#/s:7Rubicon1.abstract: Returns true if there are bytes in the ring buffer.

Classes/RingByteBuffer.html#/s:7Rubicon1.name: capacity
Classes/RingByteBuffer.html#/s:7Rubicon1.abstract: The total capacity of the buffer.

Classes/RingByteBuffer.html#/s:7Rubicon1.name: headroom

Classes/BinaryTreeNode.html#/s:7Rubicon1.abstract: Inserts a new node with the given key and value. If an existing node has the same key then it’s value is replaced with the given value and no new node is created.

Classes/BinaryTreeNode.html#/s:7Rubicon1.abstract: Removes this node from the tree.
